spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:field.spirit:name: IVG_14_CNTL
spirit:field.spirit:description: control ivg 14 4-to-1 mux 0x0 = option 0 0x1 = option 1 0x2 = option 2 0x3 = option 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: IVG_7_CNTL
spirit:field.spirit:description: control ivg 7 4-to-1 mux 0x0 = option 0 0x1 = option 1 0x2 = option 2 0x3 = option 3

spirit:register.spirit:name: SIHS0_1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Second Interrupt High Select Mux 0/1 Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: MUX22
spirit:field.spirit:description: mux

spirit:register.spirit:name: SILS0_1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Second Interrup Low Select Mux 0/1 Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: MUX29
spirit:field.spirit:description: mux

spirit:field.spirit:name: C1DM_MUX
spirit:field.spirit:description: c1dm mux control

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMAC1_EOCINH
spirit:field.spirit:description: gb dmac 1 eoc inhibit

spirit:field.spirit:name: COEL_APB_EXT_IF1:0
spirit:field.spirit:description: coel_apb_ext_if[1] 0x1 = aspec monitor only 0x3 = ext r/w

spirit:field.spirit:name: M1_TX_WB_LCT
spirit:field.spirit:description: output to the digrf m1_tx_wb_lct

spirit:field.spirit:name: M1_TX_WB_WR_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: output to the digrf m1_tx_wb_wr_en

spirit:field.spirit:name: M1_RX_HW_DATA_C_RDEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: output to the digrf m1_rx_hw_data_c_rden

spirit:field.spirit:name: TX_WB_SM_RE
spirit:field.spirit:description: output to the digrf_tx_wb_sm_reset 0x0 = asserted 0x1 = de-asserted

spirit:field.spirit:name: COEL_ASP_DIGRF_CLKEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: coel_asp_digrf_clken

spirit:field.spirit:name: DIGRF4_WB_TX_LCT
spirit:field.spirit:description: digrf4 wb_tx_lct signals

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_15_14
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [15:14] this field is used to select tcu_gpob signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[7] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[3] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[7] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[11] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[15]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_13_12
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [13:12] this field is used to select tcu_gpob signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[6] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[2] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[6] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[10] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[14]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_11_10
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [11:10] this field is used to select tcu_gpob signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[5] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[1] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[5] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[8] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[13]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_9_8
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [9:8] this field is used to select tcu_gpob signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[4] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[0] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[4] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[8] 0 = m1_tcu_gpob[12]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_7_6
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [7:6] this field is used to select tcu_gpoa signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[3] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[3] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[7] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[11] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[15]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_5_4
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [5:4] this field is used to select tcu_gpoa signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[2] to super_log in fb modem: 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[2] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[6] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[10] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[14]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_3_2
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [3:2] this field is used to select tcu_gpoa signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[1] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[1] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[5] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[8] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[13]

spirit:field.spirit:name: TCU_TIME_SIG_SEL_1_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: select tcu signals [1:0] this field is used to select tcu_gpoa signals to be m_tcu_time_signals[0] to super_log in fb modem. 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[0] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[4] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[8] 0 = m1_tcu_gpoa[12]
